column4: hi there. in the past, i've been able to copy .deb files into /var/cache/apt/archives from one host onto another, preventing re-downloading of the packages, but trying to do so now, from 9.10 to 10.04 makes no difference. i.e. the upgrade process is downloading all the packages again. has anything changed?
yes, i've copied lucid packages from an already upgraded machine onto the one which i want to upgrade
maybe there's a different dir, i'm not sure
